item.title: Azure Monitor - Networksss
item.description:
Azure has a number of tools for network monitoring. Luckily Azure Monitor for Networks is now in preview - and offers a consolidation of all tools into one single dashboard.

The monitoring space within Azure is actually divided in four major pillars:

Resource Metrics, logs & health, connectivity, traffic and diagnostics:
